text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.03.Polio"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.03.Polio

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio

title: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Polio vaccine

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT03

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at birth (polio-endemic country and high risk of spread)

description: Provide birth dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the zero dose recommendation at birth (until 2 weeks old) due to patient being in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread. Patient will continue the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" < 2text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio-endemic country with high risk of spread" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at 6 weeks old

description: Provide 1st dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 14 weeks old

description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 14 weeks old

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1 Dose given 4 weeks ago

description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

Expressions

*"Date last bOPV dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.04

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1 Dose given at least 4 months ago

description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1 dose IPV given at least 4 months ago

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last IPV dose given" >= "4 months"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1 dose IPV given at least 4 months ago

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1 dose IPV given at least 4 months ago

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.05

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 2 Doses given 4 weeks ago

description: Provide 3rd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Combined bOPV and IPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 2nd dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.06

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 8 weeks old

description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 8 weeks old

Expressions

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.07

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)

description: Provide 1st dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last IPV dose given" <= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"Sequential IPV-OPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.08

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

Expressions

*"Country has a high risk of exposure to polio" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)

action

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"Sequential IPV-OPV Schedule" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose bOPV (Second dose in 3-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.12

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio - No Doses

description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV Only" schedule

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" <= 8text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

definition: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio.15

action

title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 4th dose (booster)

description: Provide 4th dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "3 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Age when 1st IPV dose was given" < "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"High Coverage of Polio and Risk of Wild Importation" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)
